output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```


```{r}
html <- read_html('https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Democracy_Index')
```

```{r}
tables <- html %>% html_nodes(".wikitable")
table <- tables[[1]]
table %>%
  html_table() %>%
  select(2:3) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  slice_head(n = nrow(.) - 1) %>% 
  mutate(score = as.numeric(score))
```
